Text:
Reuploaded this because I could find this particular one on Pirate Bay anywhere, and don't want to direct you to another site.

Do not install redistributables when prompted during installation.

Run Setup.exe in folder and go through prompts without installing redistributables.

MP and Zombies not working but SP does!!!
Sorry, I didn't modify or "repack" it, just reuploading it because it works, take it or leave it, I don't mind
why is this working and no one else heh ??
why is this working and no one elses??
Not working; followed what instructions there were. reinstalled but still not working. error on startup after a black screen after an error at the very end of installation both times.
Steam has to be installed as well, you don't have to set up an account, but install steam.
Has anyone gone beyond the fourth mission?
Has anyone gone further from fourth mission (Time and Fate) without crashes?
I can not get SP to work. The installer has an error and when I try to load SP it also has an error. Had steam installed before dling this.

http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/Call-of-Duty-Black-Ops-II.html

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows Vista SP2 or Windows 7
CPU: Intel Core2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz
Memory: 2GB for 32-bit OS or 4GB for 64-bit OS
Gnomes: Four hardened micro-gnomes with front line combat experience
Video Card: Nvidia GeForce 8800GT 512 MB or ATI Radeon HD 3870 512 MB

So I installed everything correctly, didn't install the redistributables, and when I click "play" the screen goes black and it says "Black Ops 2 has stopped working". I don't even get to the title screen. Working repack my ass.
If this is not working for you, then there is something wrong with your machine sorry to say, I have installed this one of 7 machines.  Windows 7 32bit, steam installed
